title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2657.1 - Purpose and scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2657.1 - Purpose and scope

State Regulations
(a) It is the
responsibility and the intent of the division to fully comply with the
provisions of article 6-A of the Public Officers Law, the Personal Privacy

Protection Law. (b) The division
shall maintain in its records only such personal information that is relevant
and necessary to accomplish a purpose of the division authorized by
law. (c) The division seeks to
ensure that all records pertaining to or used with respect to individuals are
accurate, relevant, timely and complete. (d) These regulations provide information
regarding the procedures by which rights granted by the Personal Privacy

Protection Law may be asserted. (e) Personal information will be collected, whenever practicable, directly from the
person to whom the information pertains. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2657.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
